forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with a chance of rain, then thunderstorms in the afternoon. High of 72F. Winds from the South at 5 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with a chance of rain, then thunderstorms in the afternoon. High of 22C. Breezy. Winds from the South at 10 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with a chance of a thunderstorm and rain, then a chance of rain after midnight. Low of 59F. Winds from the SW at 5 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with a chance of a thunderstorm and rain, then a chance of rain after midnight. Low of 15C. Breezy. Winds from the SW at 10 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with a chance of rain, then rain in the afternoon. High of 61F. Breezy. Winds from the SW at 10 to 20 mph shifting to the NW in the afternoon. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with a chance of rain, then rain in the afternoon. High of 16C. Breezy. Winds from the SW at 15 to 30 km/h shifting to the NW in the afternoon. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with a chance of rain. Low of 46F. Breezy. Winds from the North at 15 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with a chance of rain. Low of 8C. Windy. Winds from the North at 25 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast in the morning, then mostly cloudy. High of 54F. Breezy. Winds from the NNW at 15 to 20 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast in the morning, then mostly cloudy. High of 12C. Windy. Winds from the NNW at 25 to 35 km/h.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low of 45F. Winds from the NNW at 10 to 15 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low of 7C. Breezy. Winds from the NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext: Clear in the morning, then partly cloudy. High of 61F. Winds from the NNW at 10 to 15 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear in the morning, then partly cloudy. High of 16C. Breezy. Winds from the NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low of 45F. Breezy. Winds from the NNW at 10 to 20 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low of 7C. Breezy. Winds from the NNW at 20 to 25 km/h.
